import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { switchMap } from 'rxjs/operators'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list', templateUrl: './list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list.component.scss'], }) export class ListComponent { // users: any[] = []; users$ = this.userService.users$; constructor(private userService: UserService, private route: ActivatedRoute) { // this.route.queryParams.pipe( // switchMap(qp => { // const filterName = qp['filter']; // return this.userService.loadUsers(filterName ? { name: filterName } : undefined) // }) // ).subscribe(users => { // this.users = users; // }); } }
